overview: After ditching her successful fiancé and lucrative law career, independent Liza pursues her dream of owning a doggie-day care. With the help of her hardworking and hilarious co-workers, including the hypersexual ADI and the fabulous hairdresser Daveed, Liza's business begins to flourish. However doggie treats and bottom lines aren’t the only things consuming Liza’s mind: there’s real chemistry brewing with resident dogwalker/genius slacker Matt. But can Liza truly risk a relationship with an employee, even if he is adorable?
title: Fetching
